options.content: If Node Counts Are Wrong, Then Make Sure Agent Is Configured On Each Cassandra Node & All Agents Are Running.

Node Color Green Indicates Cassandra Is Up and Running Normally
Node Color Red Indicates Cassandra Is Down

If "Row Cache" is not being reported here, then verify if "Row Cache" is enabled on your Cassandra Nodes.
NOTE : These Metrics Are Not Available In "DataStax Enterprise"
Metrics Are Reset During Restart Of Cassandra
NOTE : These Metrics Are Not Available In "DataStax Enterprise"

Cassandra Dashboard by ORAMAD


Software Used :
Prometheus : Collects and Stores Metrics in Time Series Database
Prometheus node_exporter : Gathers and Publishes Metrics From Each Server
Grafana : Visualization Tool for Metrics Served by Prometheus
Metrics : OS and Cassandra Metrics Are Gathered Using Light-weight Custom Bash Scripts and Cassandra metrics-reporter
Version 2.0 (October 2022)

Visit GitHub Page For More Details
